text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem cs-recommendation-strength-awmf

This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-recommendation-strength-awmf defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
A Strong RecommendationUses wording such as 'shall' / 'shall not' (original: 'soll' / 'soll nicht').Starke Empfehlung
B RecommendationUses wording such as 'should' / 'should not' (original: 'sollte' / 'sollte nicht').Empfehlung
0 Open RecommendationUses wording such as 'may be considered' / 'may be omitted' (original: 'kann erwogen werden' / 'kann verzichtet werden').Empfehlung offen

name: RecommendationStrengthAWMF
title: Recommendation Strength (AWMF)
description: CodeSystem defining the grading of recommendations according to German guideline methodology as used in AWMF S3 guidelines.

concept.definition: Uses wording such as 'shall' / 'shall not' (original: 'soll' / 'soll nicht').
Uses wording such as 'should' / 'should not' (original: 'sollte' / 'sollte nicht').
Uses wording such as 'may be considered' / 'may be omitted' (original: 'kann erwogen werden' / 'kann verzichtet werden').

extension.valueString: Nutzung von Formulierungen mit 'kann erwogen werden' / 'kann verzichtet werden'
